example.eg: Claire wears a brace on her knee when she runs.
example.egtrans: 克莱尔跑步时会在膝盖上戴个支架。

example.eg: The boys have already erected the braces for the frame of the new barn.
example.egtrans: 男孩们已经为新谷仓的框架竖起了支架。

example.eg: The software engineer put braces around the line of code.
example.egtrans: 软件工程师用大括号括上代码行。

example.eg: The farmer carried a shotgun in one hand and a brace of pheasants in the other.
example.egtrans: 农夫一手拿着猎枪，另一手拿着一对野鸡。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一对野鸡, 两只野鸡

example.eg: She couldn't wait to have her braces removed once her teeth had been straightened.
example.egtrans: 一矫正完牙齿，她就想摘掉牙套。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 牙套, 牙齿矫正器, 牙齿正畸架

dsense.name: braces
dsense.guideword: UK (suspenders: straps that hold trousers up) (裤子的)

example.eg: He wore striped braces only at the weekends.
example.egtrans: 他只在周末穿条纹的背带。

example.eg: A brace is a handheld device used for drilling holes in wood.

dsense.name: brace
dsense.guideword: often plural (music: line connecting staves) (音乐)

example.eg: Braces are used to connect staves in a piece of sheet music.
example.egtrans: 连谱号用于连接一首散页乐谱的五线谱。

example.eg: The wooden beams braced the unsteady walls of the building.
example.egtrans: 木梁支撑着这栋建筑并不牢固的墙。

example.eg: The doctor warned the patient's family to brace themselves.
example.egtrans: 医生提醒病人家属做好准备。

example.eg: Everyone is bracing themselves for the foot of snow forecast for tonight.
example.egtrans: 所有人都在准备迎接今晚天气预报的大雪。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 准备迎接（令人震撼之事）, 抱紧自己

example.eg: Seeing that there was no way to escape, Joel braced himself for the blow of the other man's fist.
example.egtrans: 约珥发现自己无处可逃，便振作精神，做好准备迎击另一人的拳头。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 做好准备，振作精神, 隅撑, 角撑
